title: Funny moment dog puts out its paws so that a street shoe polisher in Chile can shine them
text:
A dog in South American could not pass up on the chance to pamper itself on a city sidewalk.

A bystander in Chile recently recorded the astonishing moment a pooch approached a shoe polisher for a quick treatment on its paws.

The footage shows how demanding the dog is as it first raised its left front paw, drawing a laugh from the Chilean street worker.

A dog in Chile stopped in its tracks to pamper itself and get a manicure from a shoeshiner

The street worker struggles to contain his laughter as the dog extends his paws for a well-deserved pedicure

The canine slightly lifts its right front foot as the shoeshiner hilariously greets him.

The dog then crosses both paws as the boot polisher rubs a cloth over them.

Subsequently, the four-legged creature extends its left paw again as the man tries to contain his laughter.

The dog then stares down the polisher before the 22-second video comes to an end.
description: A dog in Chile could not pass up on the chance to pamper itself on a city sidewalk.
